Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: A friendly, English style pub with a nice and pleasant lady who served us our beers with a smile on her face..Prices were okish and the place was nicely decorated as we sat inside because of the breeze ..it was clean and comfortable..happly would re visit if we pass by from that side..

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: One of the oldest bar in Amsterdam (They  claimed). Nice little bar and good to stop by for a local Heineken!

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Cozy place, beautiful decoration for a proper pub, great service. This pub is a piece of history. Don't miss it! Go, sit down, relax, and enjoy your beer with good music. PS low prices

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Nice local Pub - Pieter the bartender (super nice), They have a pull table, a tv for sports and unique clientele :)

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Rude old Bartender. It was my birthday last Jan. 21. I asked him if we could have this Beer (pointing at the menu) or what but he said it was not available and he later said it was "only for the Locals". The Nerve!!! We went there to have ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Nice seating areas, had 2x nice ham and cheese toasts for around 6 euro. Had an alright gin too. Staff was fluent at English as well as the service being good.

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Very NICE people! Love it! Happy Birthday to a birthday girl there, 21st, today 7th if March 2020. Wish you ALL THE BEST!

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Nice place with a big selection of beers. Worth it a visit. There are also available tables outside if you're a smoker. Quit place in the heart of Amsterdam. If you're passing by it worth it a visit

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Cosy, quiet. Great pub!

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy

Name: Caf√© Frits Mooy
Review Text: Very friendly staff, adequate prices, cosy atmosphere, good choice of music...a perfect mix for a beverage with the dearest of acquaintances.
